synopsis.title: Synopsis
synopsis.description: Before breaking up with her long-time boyfriend, Jess, Mae makes a frantic plan to find him a new girlfriend before she leaves. As her well-intentioned scheme spirals into chaos, both are forced to face the messy reality of love, independence, and the uncertain future aheadâ€”all set to a catchy, original soundtrack in this lively musical comedy.
